tasks.label: Auto Build and Run
args: ext='${fileExtname}'; file='${file}'; base='${fileBasenameNoExtension}'; build='${workspaceFolder}/build'; in='${workspaceFolder}/input.txt'; out='${workspaceFolder}/output.txt'; mkdir -p "$build"; case "$ext" in '.cpp') g++ "$file" -o "$build/$base.out" && "$build/$base.out" < "$in" > "$out" ;; '.c') gcc "$file" -o "$build/$base.out" && "$build/$base.out" < "$in" > "$out" ;; '.py') python3 "$file" < "$in" > "$out" ;; *) echo "Unsupported file extension: $ext"; exit 1 ;; esac
